text: (a strikale viliccuvaruttiyitt‌) addeham (rajav‌) ceadiccu: yusuphine vasikarikkuvan ninnal sramam natattiyappeal ninnalute sthiti entayirunnu? avar parannu: allahu etra parisud'dhan! nannal yusuphinepparri deasakaramaya onnum manas'silakkiyittilla. prabhuvinre bharya parannu: ippeal satyam velippettirikkunnu. nan addehatte vasikarikkan sramikkukayanuntayat‌. tirccayayum addeham satyavanmarute kuttattil tanneyakunnu
